snippet: The men, Humayoun Ghoulan Nabi, 27, of Queens, and Ismael Alsarabbi, 32, of Brooklyn, were taken into custody Monday after an investigation that began in 2011.
abstract: Humayoun Ghoulan Nabi of Queens and Ismael Alsarabbi of Brooklyn are arrested on charges they sought to supply Taliban and other terrorist fighters with warm clothes and equipment for use in wintertime battle with United States forces in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The men, Humayoun Ghoulan Nabi, 27, of Queens, and Ismael Alsarabbi, 32, of Brooklyn, were taken into custody Monday after an investigation that began in 2011.

headline.main: Two Are Charged in Plan to Send Goods to Taliban
headline.print_headline: Two Are Charged in Plan To Send Goods to Taliban
